name: Exercise 2 - Dynamic Text
description:
This project is a mini game in which the user has to take decisions on where they want to go to vacation, how was their last pizza, and what is their favorite animal. The game has a funny take, because the user is supposed to do, or decide, other real life things while he is just taking decisions on easy things. 

The fun part about this project was to make the animated text in the background. If I were to implement this game, I would add another question, asking the user if they are a dog or a cat person, or just adding in the code, that if the person writes 'dog' the image of a dog will appear instead of the one with the cat. 

For this mini game I used two fonts, both playful but different in thickness and weight. The main colors are purple, pink, and yellow. During this exercise I also learned how to integrate images in a dropdown menu.
